comment: He is a part time professor of informational systems his first semester was fall of 2024 when i had the class and i don't think he ever looked at the course he just assigned crazy due dates and assignments. worst part he gets back to you on emails within 3-4 WEEKS!!!
STEER CLEAR!! JOKE OF A PROFESSOR.
Hands down the most unorganized professor I've ever had.

Avoid at all costs. If you are unfortunately forced to take him, don't sign up for the class. I am an optimistic student and always try to assume the best out of a professor, but I can say that the rating doesn't do him justice. He is much worse. Save your mental health and take a gap semester. He is extremely rude for someone I pay to teach me.

Very large communication barrier with this prof. Does not respond or give clear instructions, so many times during the semester the entire class is in a panic to figure out assignments. Often times we get low grades with no explanation and overall just a very difficult prof to work with.

Does not pay attention or care for students. Whole class failed two assignments in a row, a midterm and project and he did not provide any curve or feedback as he "does not pay attention to class averages". He only has two exams, the final and the midterm, along with projects that are somewhat heavy. Does not seem to care up struggling students.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: This professor does not have clear instructions at all. The information is hard to digest, as a lot is thrown at you at once without a lot of help.

Besides the Group project the class is pretty easy. He will make you think that the courses midterm and finale is going to be on campus and then last minute decide to make it online (to make it easier on him) in order to get course evaluations. The answers are majority online. I suggest buddy up and share answers. Follow the rubric!

The class is a joke. All the tests are online and answers can be googled. You don't even have to read the book. Discussion posting is a joke. You can just copy somebody else and paraphrase. Group project is a joke bc of his unfair grading. You don't have to contribute and he'll give you a passing grade anyway. He is very unreliable outside of class
Dr. Ali is arrogant and some what abrasive. He doesn't adhere to his own grading policies, and has very little respect for his students. Little man with a big ego and mouth.

Very nice professor. Took his class online and the coursework and deadlines were very organized. Discussions every week are lengthy and take some time to get full credit, also need to reply to 2 classmates with lengthy responses. The book is mandatory, all the discussions and quiz material comes from the chapter. Got an A with the work I put in.

Way too basic of a course. It was made even more simple (and high school like) by his teaching style. If you want to do a lot of brainless, automated work that has no meaning then take this class. If you want to learn something, go take another professor.

You will be required to do 2 case reports, access task, excel task, essay every week, 2 exams and a group project. There is another professor at KSU for this class, take him. You will not enjoy this class with Dr .Ali Radwan. Way too much homework.

You will be required to do 2 case reports, access task, excel task, essay every week, 2 exams and a group project. There is another professor at KSU for this class, take him. You will hate this class with Dr .Ali Radwan. Way too much homework.
